title: 369: Bekah was an Alien Baby
itunes:title: 369: Bekah was an Alien Baby
description:
The Broads are here to chat - they talk about grief and Jess’ recent pet loss, they discuss living in “the simulation”, dive into Bekah’s very weird and wild past life regression experience, death doulas, and more.

 

*Stay tuned for ticket links to their upcoming exclusive “The Broads, The Bros, & The Final Rose” virtual show THIS Saturday (March 19th) - follow @chattybroads on Instagram for updates! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***BLENDERS: Get 15% off at BLENDERSEYEWEAR.COM and use code CHATTYVIP

***FUZZY: Get a FREE 7-day trial membership at YOURFUZZY.COM/CHATTY and for a limited time get a special discount of $20 off any of your pet’s product needs - pet meds, supplements, food, and more with promo code CHATTY
